basics.name: Abde Manaaf Z. Ghadiali
basics.label: ML Engineer, Data Scientist, Quantum Computing Researcher
basics.summary: Built a strong foundation in computer science and machine learning through rigorous coursework, research, and 3+ years of experience, specializing in deep learning, quantum computing, and statistical analysis, while leading projects on AI/ML and recommendation systems.
basics.location: 2111 Richmond Hwy, Arlington, Virginia, United States, 22202

work.name: School of Engineering and Applied Sciences, Geroge Washington University
work.summary: As a Teaching Assistant, I evaluated coursework, led Java lab sessions, and mentored students in Python, Java, and Software Engineering, fostering an inclusive learning environment while developing innovative teaching strategies.
highlights: CSCI 1012 Introduction to Programming with Python.

work.name: Thoucentric (A Xoriant Company)
work.position: Senior ML Engineer and Data Scientist
work.summary: Developed AI-driven solutions to optimize manufacturing, including a thermodynamics-based recommendation engine reducing vehicle painting defects by 40%, ML pipelines for fault detection and forecasting, and scalable deployments on GCP and Databricks.
highlights: Innovation of Thermodynamics based Recommendation System.
Two-Year Consecutive Organizational Award Winner for Best Performance.

work.name: Thoucentric (A Xoriant Company)
work.summary: Designed a data preparation pipeline using SQL and Python to enhance model efficiency and quality, and developed ML/DL models achieving up to 93% accuracy in detecting automotive painting defects.

certificates.name: The Data Science Course 2022: Complete Data Science Bootcamp

awards.title: Neon Making a Difference Award
awards.summary: Recognized for exceptional leadership in managing recruitment and interviews.

awards.title: Atlas Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding contributions and commitment to project success.
